vi.author: Mai
vi.preview: Dear Ryo, I hope this message...
vi.full: Dear Ryo, I hope this message finds you well. Your dedication and hard work inspire us every day. As a Vietnamese fan, I want you to know that we support you wholeheartedly in all your endeavors. Your performances always bring joy to our hearts, and we're so proud to see you grow as an artist with NCT WISH. Please take care of your health and know that you have fans all over the world who love and support you. We believe in you and can't wait to see what amazing things you'll accomplish next. Keep shining bright!
